title: ENI
description: ENI is an integrated energy company known for its striking brand colors. The dominant black (231F20) symbolizes power and sophistication, while the bright red (CD1041) adds a bold, dynamic contrast, capturing attention. The vibrant yellow (FFD41E) enhances the palette, reflecting energy and optimism. These colors are prominently featured in the company's branding across various platforms, including their official website, http://eni.com.
